EmailTemplate.description: New Email Template setup in June 2012
EmailTemplate.name: Weekly Update 7th March, 2013 (correction)
EmailTemplate.subject: Weekly Update 7th March, 2013 with correction
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Dear Parents,
Sorry for the overload of school emails but we have just realised an error in the date for the Family Fun Day.
ISM Family Fun Day
The date for this annual event has been confirmed as Saturday 25th May (times to be confirmed) Please do put this date in your diary as it is a day when the school community comes together and enjoys family orientated activities organised by the staff, students and parents. More details will follow in April.
Sorry for the inconvenience.
Best regards,
The International School of Moscow World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Member of The British School Group- University of Cambridge Examination Centre - Affiliate Member of the Conference of British International Schools - Licensed by the Russian Ministry of Education
